originalText.text: I really needed to write this review earlier, but better late than never! Dr. Westrich did a total knee replacement on my right knee on May 3, 2022. Here I am, a little over 19 months later and I can honestly say I can do everything! I can run, walk, bike, do cardio on any machine at the gym as well as take aqua aerobics classes. I have no pain, hardly any scar, and my only regret is waiting so long to have the operation. Dr. Westrich did an amazing job, and he has a great team behind him. I highly recommend him if you need a knee replacement.

originalText.text: Dr. Westrich?  He did  a great job, beyond my expectations, with my 83 yr. old male left knee replacement ,- is like new and strong, with minimal pretty scar.  Great post-op pain management crew. No pain  at all. What else need to say.

originalText.text:
This doctor is amazing!  In so many ways. Not only is he a wonderful surgeon but I find him to be a very caring doctor (not common there days).

I had a knee Revision (replacement of a replacement) surgery on 8/5.  After relatively little pain and some good rehab today (9/15) I am easily able to walk 4-5 miles with virtually no pain.

This was my third knee replacement (first by him) and he his head and shoulders ahead of everyone else

I cannot recommend him, and his entire office staff more

originalText.text: I just called the office to make an appointment for my father. I spoke to the office manger explaining my father situation that he cannot walk and that we need to see the doc asap for consultation for surgery. She was rude and not compassionate for my father situation.  This is contrary from what i heard about that office and how nice they are. So if u have a situation and need help and compassion don't look for it in this office

originalText.text: Fantastic surgeon!  Dr. Westrich explained the procedure clearly (I had knee surgery) and he provided detailed answers to my (many) questions. My knee healed perfectly and I’ve been pain-free ever since. I highly recommend this highly competent and very nice surgeon, and will definitely go back to him if I ever need orthopedic surgery again.
